name: Lithuanian Ornithological Society
goal: Lithuanian Ornithological Society (LOD) â€“ BirdLife Lithuania seeks to conserve bird species in Lithuania by protecting their habitats and, through this, to work for the world's biological diversity and the sustainability of human use of natural resources. The LOD is the largest NGO in Lithuania, which is working on nature conservation issues. It has a unique position in promoting the results of management and monitoring to various local and national stakeholders, multipliers as well as general public in Lithuania.
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives:
Birds Directive
Habitats Directive
Common Agriculture Policy (CAP)
Bycatch action plan
EU marine and fisheries policies
Water framework directive
